testcase.classname: Login Credentials Stored in Local Browser
testcase.name: Check whether login credentials stored on browsers local storage
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Facebook Home Page.........................................passed When User stores login information in local browser.........................passed Then User able to see stored information in local browser...................passed

testcase.name: Check whether user could able to navigate to Log-In Screen page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Facebook Log-In Screen of the application..................passed When User enters valid Login Name and Password and clicks on login button..passed Then User navigate to Facebook Home Page....................................passed

testcase.name: Check whether user could able to Logout
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Dashboard Screen of the application........................passed When User navigate to the dropdown icon upper left corner by clicks on it...passed And User clicks Logout icon................................................passed Then User able to logout successfully.......................................passed

testcase.name: Check whether after logout user could able to access friends page
testcase.system-out: Given User is on Facebook Sign in Screen....................................passed When User navigate to the facebook friends page without sigin in............passed Then User gets error message................................................passed
